hadiths.text: It was narrated that 'Amr bin Dinar said:"I heard Jabir bin 'Abdullah say: 'The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: "If any one of you comes and the Imam has appeared, let him pray two Rak'ahs. Shu'bah (one of the narrators) said: "On Friday

chapter.ara-name: بَابُ الصَّلاَةِ يَوْمَ الْجُمُعَةِ لِمَنْ جَاءَ وَقَدْ خَرَجَ الإِمَامُ
chapter.eng-name: Prayer On Friday For One Who Comes When The Imam Has Come Out
